title: Lal Bahadur Shastri Hall of Residence
content: Lal Bahadur Shastri Hall of Residence, also known as LBS Hall is the largest hall of residence at IIT Kharagpur.

The hall was founded in 2011 and is the newest of all the 22 halls of IIT Kharagpur. In 2011, finished blocks (A, D) were allotted to M.Tech and PhD students. Later in 2012, the construction of B, AB blocks were complete and were allotted to the undergraduate freshers. The construction was finally completed in 2013. In 2014, graduate students were shifted to MMM Hall and B R Ambedkar Hall, thus making it an undergraduate hall in entirety.

The five floored (G+4) building of the hall is divided into four blocks - A, B, C and D, each of them fully connected through AA, AB, BC, CD and DD blocks respectively. With an expandable capacity of more than 2000, it currently houses 1997 students which includes around 1535 first year undergraduate students. It has a separate two floor unit building attached to the southern side of building which provides space for two food messes.
The music room is equipped with all the required and most played music instruments with the greatest quality product. It's current location is C-Block ground floor.

The hall is fully equipped with space and equipment requirements for several sports activities. It has two badminton courts, a basketball court, two table tennis tables, a football ground, a cricket pitch for net practice, and a volleyball court. There is a gym located at the ground floor of BC Block.
A night canteen which operates at 2nd floor mess from 9:30 pm till 2:30 am in the morning.
A Nescafe shop just beside the main gate where you can get tea, coffee & fast food like burger, patties. It opens in morning at 9 AM and remains open till 3 AM in the morning.
A juice stall also operates jointly and remains open from 10 am in the morning till evening and reopens in night. (Ram Da)
DD-100s series has the LBS Milk Stall where he sells Milk, Maggi, Dosa and Uthappam, Biriyani (Mon, Thurs, Sat) and other snack items
A general store at the ground floor of AB block for general goods and everyday utilities including food and drinks. (Open till 11PM)
A Xerox & Stationery shop with all the supporting utilities in the ground floor of B-wing.
A laundry service is also present in the ground floor of CD-wing.
There is Common Room in the A block of the hall which houses events, workshops and information seminars.
A beautiful hanging garden is being made at the entrance of hall (currently out of condition)

Initiated in 2014, the LBS Recreation Month, or the #LBSRecMonth is a month long event aimed at increasing interactions between students of LBS Hall, IIT Kharagpur. It consists of a host of Team-building games and events with a prerequisite that a team formed must have a mix of students from at least two different batches.

Spanning a month, the event encompasses around 10 team events. Each event having teams with at least one 3rd year, one 2nd year and two 1st years students. LBS Recreation Month is a fun, innovative and an effective way to bring in interaction between various batches of students.
